title.narrative: External accountability component run by Development Alternatives International - DAI - Closure underway

description.narrative: This activity (External accountability component run by Development Alternatives International - DAI - Closure underway) is a component of Security Sector Accountability & Police Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £11,955,136. This component benefits Congo (Democratic Republic), and works in the following sector(s): Democratic participation and civil society, Security system management and reform. , with the following implementing partners: DAI Europe. The start date is 01-12-2009 and the end date is 31-05-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
